event: calculi in both kidneys associated with ureteral calculi
HLL combined with double J catheterization
invasive ventilatory support with endotracheal intubation
loud bubbling sound in the lung
amino-terminal brain natriuretic peptide precursor >35,000 pg/L
ECMO venous leading-out end used a 20F catheter
arterial leading-in end used a 17F catheter
No. 6 arterial catheter was placed in the right femoral artery
Imipenem and Cilastatin sodium combined with Vancomycin
minimum serum trough concentration of Vancomycin 15–20 μg/mL
renal function scaled as acute kidney injury grade 3
vascular ultrasonography and computed tomography angiography
necrotic tissues of the lower extremity amputated
anti-infective therapy replaced by Cefoperazone sodium and Sulbactam sodium
